ConnectionStrings._comment start: If you want the c# app to consider this appsetting.json file you have to install Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json nuget package
ConnectionStrings._comment sql service provider: '\MSSQLLocalDB': in the local instance of the server's database is used(u can get all of the available instances by '$ sqllocaldb i')
ConnectionStrings._comment connection: 'Trusted_Connection=True': its using the default built in connection of the windows, but if you what to use a remote SQL server, you have to use a sql profile(User=...;Password=...) instead of default access connection
ConnectionStrings._comment generate sql script from code: in cmd => C:\ProjectFolder $ dotnet ef migrations add MigrationName
